definition: (neologism c. 2013) organized disruption of healthcare facilities or verbal and physical abuse of medical staff, by an aggrieved patient or proxies such as family members or hired thugs, typically aimed at obtaining compensation
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

sentences.english: The spread of "medical dispute profiteer", attracted academics and the industry's attention.
sentences.chinese: 医闹“现象的蔓延，引起了学者和业内人士的关注。

sentences.english: The phenomenon Of medical dispute profiteer(MDP)is from medical malpractice dispute, most medical therapy units encounter this condition.
sentences.chinese: 医闹现象源于医疗纠纷，各类医疗单位都曾经发生。

definition: hospital scalper/sb who for a profit entices others to obtain medical care
to have disregard for human life (idiom)
to seek an audience with higher-ups (esp. government officials) to petition for sth
"drugs serving to nourish doctors", perceived problem in PRC medical practice
